name: niedakh.net
body:
# Piotr Szymański
### Scientist, Data Analyst, Developer, Social Entrepreneur
### H-index: 1 :)

### My intersts
* psychology of perception & aesthetics, cognitive psychology
* psychosociological changes in human mind functioning between analog and digital realities
* architecture & urban planning, city transport
* historical social networks
* data analysis, machine learning, social network analysis
* analysis of algorithms, analytical combinatorics
* design thinking

### Publications
* Anusiewicz, P., Chmiel, A., Grodzka, E., Kuc, M., Maliszewska, M., Pol, E., & **Szymański, P.** (2011). [The Analytical Psychology Of Architecture Between Subjective Expression And Objective Meaning.](http://hdl.handle.net/123456789/1608) In: V Projetar: processos de projeto teorias e práticas. Belo Horizonte: Eschola de Arquitetura da Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais, art. nr 40, pp. 1-13. ISSN 2237-5007.

* **Szymański, P.**, & Kajdanowicz, T. (2013). [MLG: Enchancing multi-label classification with modularity-based label grouping. In Hybrid Artificial Intelligent Systems]() (pp. 431-440). Springer Berlin Heidelberg.

* Chmiel A., **Szymański P.** (2014) [Smutek pokolenia translatorów](http://jbc.bj.uj.edu.pl/dlibra/docmetadata?id=276170&from=publication). W: Wysocka-Pleczyk M., Tucholska K. (Eds), Pikor M. (Eds), Człowiek zalogowany 2 : wirtualne społeczności. Kraków: Biblioteka Jagiellońska, pp. 77-92.

* Augustyniak, L., Kajdanowicz, T., **Szymański, P.**, Tuliglowicz, W., Kazienko, P., Alhajj, R., & Szymanski, B. (2014, August). Simpler is better? Lexicon-based ensemble sentiment classification beats supervised methods. In Advances in Social Networks Analysis and Mining (ASONAM), 2014 IEEE/ACM International Conference on (pp. 924-929). IEEE.

### Conference talks
* 2011.10.25-28. Anusiewicz, P., Chmiel, A., Grodzka, E., Kuc, M., Maliszewska, M., Pol, E., & **Szymański, P.** "The Analytical Psychology Of Architecture Between Subjective Expression And Objective Meaning." [V Projetar 2011 – Processos de Projeto: teorias e práticas ](http://www.mom.arq.ufmg.br/vprojetar/). Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais, Belo Horizonte, Brasil.
* 2013.03 Chmiel A., **Szymański P.** "Smutek pokolenia translatorów". III Człowiek Zalogowany. Jagiellonian University. Cracow. Poland.
* 2013.09 **Szymański, P.**, & Kajdanowicz, T. "MLG: Enchancing Multi-label Classification with Modularity-Based Label Grouping". HAIS'13. University of Salamanca. Salamanca, Spain.
* 2014.03 Chmiel A., **Szymański P.** "Odzyskać wspólnotę śmiechu – odzyskać więź międzypokoleniową". IV Człowiek Zalogowany. Jagiellonian University. Cracow. Poland.
* 2014.04.09 Chmiel, Andrzej, **Szymański Piotr**, Kuc Maria, Struzik Hanna, Lenart Wiktoria. "Sprawczość jako droga do rzeczywistości samoodzwierciedlenia - pokolenie analogowe i cyfrowe oraz smutek translatorów". Nowe Idee w Psychologii Społecznej. SWPS, Wrocław. Poland.
* 2014.04.26 Koniarek Damian, Madziara Renata, and **Szymański Piotr** : [Towards a study of the structure of the business & science social network of the 2nd Polish Republic.](http://dx.doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.1045413) [The Connected Past](http://connectedpast.soton.ac.uk/): People, Networks and Complexity in Archaeology and History at CAA'14. Sciences Po. Paris. France.
* 2014.08.17. Augustyniak Lukasz, Kajdanowicz Tomasz, **Szymański Piotr**, Tuligłowicz Włodzimierz. Simpler is Better? Lexicon-based Ensemble Sentiment Classification Beats Supervised Methods. 2014 International Workshop on Curbing Collusive Cyber-gossips in Social Networks (C3-2014) at ASONAM'14. Beijing, China.


### Seminar Talks
To be added.

### Grants
* 2011.02 - 2012.09. Network Sunrise. 4 mln PLN. POKL 8.2.1. EU Social Fund. Wrocław.

### Foreign scholarships

* 2012.09-12. [Stanford University](http://stanford.edu). Stanford. CA. USA.
